data.eml:eml: Descriptions and records of the Palaearctic Molophilus Curtis (Diptera, Limoniidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Starý, Jaroslav (2011): Descriptions and records of the Palaearctic Molophilus Curtis (Diptera, Limoniidae). Zootaxa 2999: 45-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.203285
